name: 1v1 Racer
description:
Player1:

Movement - AD / Joystick 1 X Axis

Accelerate - W / Joystick 1 button 1 ("O")

Brake - S / Joystick 1 button 0 ("X")

Player2:

Movement - Left, Right / Joystick 2 X Axis

Accelerate - Up / Joystick 2 button 1 ("O")

Brake - Down / Joystick 2 button 0 ("X")

Start- R / Joystick button 7 ("R3")
